recruiter.headline: Software Engineer
recruiter.profileSummary: Software Engineer skilled in full-stack development and cloud systems. Experienced in building scalable, secure, and maintainable applications with modern frameworks and databases. Curious by nature, I go beneath abstractions to design resilient architectures and write high-quality code that lasts.

developer.headline: Full Stack Developer
developer.profileSummary: Full-stack engineer curious about what happens beyond abstractions Iâ€™ve built backend services and containerized architectures with a focus on clean, scalable code that others enjoy working with while continually learning new tools and patterns

stalker.headline: Curious Explorer
stalker.profileSummary: Outside of coding, I chase adrenaline. From cliff jumps to ocean dives and bungees, I love pushing limits. Curiosity drives me in both code and life, whether on a cricket field, a pickleball court, horse riding, or soon skydiving. Why stop at ground level when you can see the world from above.
